errorDescription:
To use Chrome AI, you need Chrome version 138 or later. Follow these steps:

1. Go to `chrome://flags/#prompt-api-for-gemini-nano` and enable "Prompt API for Gemini Nano".
2. Restart Chrome to apply the flag.
3. Return to this page and click "Download Model" â€” this will download ~4 GB the first time.
4. Once downloaded, Gemini Nano can be enabled via tldw Browser_Assistant.
